Text:
Join our TS3 server to setup Co-Op games!

Server IP: infiniti.guildts.com
Also definitely support this game and GOG!
I did not include the FLAC soundtrack with this, but I can upload it separately if anyone wants it.
The Shodan full size render is missing too.
This is going to be one hell of a journey, for a pathetic creature of meat and bone such as yourself....hahaha one of the best games ever .thx for upload :D
Can't thank you enough! This was an amazing game back in the day and still is!

It seems that they have added more bonus content for the game: SHODAN full size render and concept maps. These weren't available when I initially made the torrent. I can upload them separately if anyone wants them.

Here you go, the rest of the bonus content:

thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8146042
I don't get it. The official patch for the game was 2.3 (which is quite old), and this seems to be version 2.2? Can this even be updated to the New Dark patch?

Here is a modding guide for the game:

www.gog.com/forum/system_shock_2/system_shock2_faq_patches_mods_recommendations/page1
The only thing scary about this game is the shitty hit detection and the goddamn monkeys that shoot f*cking lasers at you. In short, the perfect game for masochists!
Could not get the game to work properly.  When I go to start a new game all that is visible is a tiny, tiny portion of what I am supposed to be seeing.
